snippet: Kenneth W. Kaiser, 57, was charged with violating a law that prohibits senior government personnel from professionally contacting their old agencies for a year after they leave.
abstract: Retired Federal Bureau of Investigation official Kenneth W Kaiser is charged with violating ethics law that prohibits senior government personnel from professionally contacting their old agencies for a year after they leave them.
lead_paragraph: Kenneth W. Kaiser, 57, was charged with violating a law that prohibits senior government personnel from professionally contacting their old agencies for a year after they leave.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Former F.B.I. Official Is Charged in Ethics Case
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: EX-F.B.I. Official Is Charged In Ethics Case
